GSD.product_version: versions from v3.5 to before v4.9.318
GSD.description:
ASoC: mxs-saif: Fix refcount leak in mxs_saif_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.318 by commit c933829cbf3338b684869e6c4c8931abf5d68fbd, it was introduced in version v3.5 by commit 08641c7c74dddfcd726512edfaa3b4cbe42e523e. For more details please see the references link.
